Reviews.Title: “Awesome place!”
Reviews.Author: sadieraven
Reviews.Content: My family and I have stayed here 3 times in the last 6 years and plan to make it our yearly getaway. Very clean, friendly staff and very convenient to everything! The pool is clean and well taken care of. The rooms are comfortable. The only thing that I would add is to have an exhaust fan in the bathroom. It is a perfect family place!

Reviews.Title: “Budget friendly getaway”
Reviews.Author: broncostang
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd time staying here and it never disapoints. It's a typical motel. Nothing overly fancy, but it has a pool, close to the beach, well maintained, very quiet and exceptionally clean. There is even an elevator. At $140 a night on a weekend in season, you can't beat it. If you are looking for a clean and reasonable priced motel close to the beach, this should be your first choice. Also, there sister location, the Shangri-La, is just as nice. Keep up the good work.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful value close to the beach”
Reviews.Author: sc_and_njs
Reviews.Content: This place was just right for us ! We were in ocean city for 1 night with a 4 year old & were looking for a place that was affordable yet clean & convenient. The sea hawk was both ... In addition to being a few steps walk to a rather nice part of the beach - not crowded but great for small kids to play on. This may not be in the middle of the downtown hubbub - but that depends on what you are looking for. They do have a pool and there's plenty of restaurants & shopping within walking distance. It's definitely not a 5 star hotel- but the room was spacious, very clean & plenty of towels etc. Just right for us !!!

Reviews.Title: “Great motel OC!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Steve R
Reviews.Content: This motel is one of the cleanest I have ever seen since I been going to Ocean City Md.. The staff Ms. Linda and Pam were great and very accommodating they even held a room for me without putting a deposit down to hold the room. I have never felt so comfortable going to a Motel off of reading reviews by others. I will stay here every time I go to Ocean City,Md from know on unless they don't have any rooms available. Can't wait to see you again Ms.Linda and Ms. Pam during Sun fest week. Thanks to all the staff and keep up the good work. Stayed here on August 22-25.

Reviews.Title: “Wish I could have stayed longer!!!”
Reviews.Author: mom2specialboyz
Reviews.Content: This was our family's first time at the Sea Hawk Motel. Firs.It is one of the best places we've ever stayed for many reasons. First was the warm welcome by Linda and Pam who work at the front desk. They are so friendly and helpful it felt like a "home away from home." The next was when we saw our "room". It's more like a suite than a room. Perfect for us with 2 queen size beds and a sleep sofa. The beds were so comfortable and the sheets and bedspread so clean it was almost better than being at home! It had a full size fridge, sink, stove and even utensils, pots and pans, silverware, and even a dish towel and soap. It would be easy to cook a meal here (I forgot to mention a microwave and toaster). I'm sure there's more than is mentioned here. My favorite thing is that there's no "motel smell" which has been everywhere I've stayed at so far this summer. I've stayed in alot of places too with college visits, and then when we had no power for a week in the spring because of storms and Pepco (don't want to go there). Anyway, it's across the street from all our favorite restaurants to and the bus stop. Who could ask for more??? We can't wait to go there again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great motel in OC.”
Reviews.Author: chief682
Reviews.Content: Motel was clean and staff friendly. Pool was spotless. Great value for families. Nice quiet area in North Ocean City. Short walk to beach. Convenient to many restaurants and shopping. We will definitely stay again when we return to Ocean City.

Reviews.Title: “Lousy!”
Reviews.Author: gman121176
Reviews.Content: Got to the motel and they told us they Did not have our reservation for the day we were supposed to check in. Told me that I was wrong about the day we were to check in. Also said that If I wanted to stay there I would have to switch rooms. I told them that I should get some kind of discount and the rude Lady behind the counter said hay she could not help me anymore. DO NOT STAY HERE.

Reviews.Title: “9 years and going strong...”
Reviews.Author: brwenger
Reviews.Content: For the past nine years, a group of 15-20 of my closest friends have been staying at the Sea Hawk Motel. We absolutely adore the staff and the convenience of staying here. Being so close to the beach and having a private pool can't be beat! Thank you Linda and Pam (front desk)! We love you girls!

Reviews.Title: “Atlantis....the Golden Treasure of the Sea....”
Reviews.Author: deeleeny
Reviews.Content: From start to finish....what a lovely experience. The location is terrific...close to everything yet distant enough to see things other than the boardwalk...My husband and I came with my sister and two kids...the room was huge, clean and cool. It had a fridge,stove, microwave, etc...This hotel is a great find...when I first searched it on trip advisor among other hotels I was not sure how a motel could be #2 on trip advisor's list but took a chance as trip advisor has never let me down...low and behold I am thrilled...quality and quantity....two birds one stone! As I drove the hotel strip I could see right away why the Sea Hawk was rated so high with Trip Advisor.... Okay time for the tips: Go to Higgins....great ALYCE crabs, shrimp and corn...I could only eat one plate...Go to the beach during the day...boardwalk at night...reminds me of a gremlins...comes alive after dark...but in a good way...go at 9...and is safe...pick up t-shirts...magnets etc from the boardwalk stores-very affordable. We came from NYC so it was only a 4 hour drive...leave early if you are driving so you can take advantage of the mornings and nights in OC...it transforms as stated previously...we left nyc at 7am to arrive here by 11 am. Last but not least...we.loved Ocean City...We loved the Sea Hawk

Reviews.Title: “Surprised that a motel could be that nice...”
Reviews.Author: narykcin
Reviews.Content: My wife does not do motels. The only way I was able to convince her to give this a try was from the reviews on tripadvisor and the price. We arrived to the hotel, I mean motel and were in our rooms in minutes. We were traveling with my wife's cousin's family of six. With 2 double beds, a pull out bed, a kitchenette, and a fridge in each room, we were set for the weekend. The economy, rooms, I think they are called, a great for families or groups of friends who do not mind sharing a little personal space. There is a retractable partition that can be used to separate the sofa loundge room, from the 2 double beds. We were on the first floor, so our patio opened right into the parking lot which was convenient for loading up the car, but did not feel the most private. When we go to the beach we don't plan on spending too much time in the room, so we were not looking for the egyptian linen or plush beds, and we did not find such. Rooms had everything we needed including wifi, and offered a great price!

Reviews.Title: “This place is a gem...reviews are true!”
Reviews.Author: MagMagoo
Reviews.Content: This family-owned motel is a gem that people might overlook just driving past. From check-in to check-out, service was awesome. Our room and bathroom were super clean--everything smelled fresh. There were plenty of fresh towels and washcloths. It was nice to be able to go sit on the balcony in the morning with my coffee before starting the day! My kids enjoyed the pool. Right across the street from restaurants--you could walk if you wanted. There is a bus stop right across the street if you want to keep your car parked all week and use the bus to get to the boardwalk! The bus stop right near the front office will drop you off after a long day at the boardwalk/beach. This motel surprised me honestly, in a great way. The reviews are correct! Luxury it isn't, but it was clean, comfortable, and quiet for our stay. Lots of families here and everyone we encountered was friendly. Being able to walk out of the back of the motel and walk across the street to the beach is perfect, especially with two kids. Also, the value is great if you compare pricing for he same kind of room for the area. We definitely will keep coming back here!

Reviews.Title: “Sea Hawk - Our Home Away From Home”
Reviews.Author: Matchgame90
Reviews.Content: Our family stayed at the Sea Hawk again this year after being pleasantly surprised by this hotel last summer. If you scroll through all the reviews you’ll see mine where my chief complaint was a rather soft bed … otherwise it was perfect. Well, this year we had requested the same room as we had last year (111, in case you were wondering) because loved the location of it and also liked being on the first floor. With that being said, I want to admit that the bed was the same as last year and I slept like a baby! This hotel really is an astounding value for what you get. Our room once again had a the mini-kitchen (and I use the term “mini” lightly – it is actually quite spacious) and I think this year our room had received a new AC unit. We were there in the middle of one of the season’s worst heatwaves and they were courteous enough to turn on the air conditioning in our room before we arrived! We brought our luggage into a freshly cooled room. The housekeeping staff meets and goes beyond all expectations. I’ve stayed in quite a few hotels for work and I can truthfully say this is the cleanest property I’ve had the pleasure of staying at. The office workers have been a pleasure to speak with both when making reservations and also checking in/out. There is plenty of well-lit parking with the spaces being very accommodating to bigger vehicles. That’s not something you can say about other hotels/condos in the area. Additionally there is a new Grotto Pizza across the street complete with mini golf. It is nice to see that building back to life. Some folks have complained that ice is $1.50 a bag and that they do not supply complementary shampoo and other basic toiletries. Really? Is that really a deal breaker for you? First off, the ice is probably not complementary due to the motel’s location – people walking to and from the beach would probably just take the ice as they wish. And I always take my own toiletries wherever I go. I prefer to use my own, thank you very much. They do supply hand/facial soap along with dish soap for the kitchen. If you can’t stand forking over a measly buck fifty for a bag of ice that you can keep in your room’s freezer or are very upset that you need to bring your own Prell then I guess you just can’t be satisfied. We consider this place our home-away-from-home. You will, too!

Reviews.Title: “One of the best in OC”
Reviews.Author: Lady202
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed at this hotel last year and were pleasantly surprised. They were very reasonably priced and better than most hotels in OC. The best hotel in OC, MD for the price. A few weeks ago we lost power due to the storm, so Sat. morning we decided to skip the heat & head to OC. I started calling hotels on our way down there and again they were one of the lowest priced yet one of the largest rooms. The receptionist was very nice and held the room for us without a deposit. Another family member decided to take his family down there and we told him to call them also and they accommodated him as well. Later that day yet another family member (that lost power) decided to join us with his family and the staff was very understanding and accommodating. He arrived almost at midnight and they held the room for him. The hotel was sold out by Sat night and they still had plenty of parking. The parking spaces are large and well lit. Not like other hotels down there that are tiny and cars easily get dents & scratches. This is now my number one pick in OC. The rooms are very large, clean and reasonably priced. The staff is very nice, specially the groundskeeper. He is extremely helpful and friendly. I almost didn't write this review because I don't want this hotel to be booked when we go down there, but they deserve it. They are good people operating a good hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Glad I read the reviews first”
Reviews.Author: daltydoo
Reviews.Content: I chose this place because of the reviews on this website because I have never been to OC before, glad I did. Sure it needs updated, but it is clean, and the housekeepers do their job very well. The room was big, loved having a kitchen and a sliding divider between the living area and bedroom. We had room 116 which is on the end and on the first floor. We went on the July 4th week and it was the perfect spot for fireworks that were across the street at the park. All we had to do was sit on our porch and they were right in front of us. The location to the beach is great, a nice easy walk through condos. It is kind of far from the boardwalk, but we purchased all day bus passes, $3.00 for the whole day, or $1.00 each way. The bus stop going back is right in front of the Motel. I also noticed this place to be family friendly. The staff was very friendly, especially David I think his name was, the maintenance man originally from the Pittsburgh area, which is where we are from. The only thing that wasn't perfect was the traffic noise. My husband sleeps with earplugs, and my 11 year old can sleep through anything, I heard it but still slept very well, I usually do not in hotels. The beds were comfortable also. We are going back again next year for sure and staying here again

Reviews.Title: “SeaHawk Motel Ocean City, ND”
Reviews.Author: Claudia G
Reviews.Content: My husband and I decided to visit Ocean City, MD as a last minute mini vacation over 4 of July, must places did not have vacancies and if they did they where charging an arm and leg, very rarely do I stay in a motel so I was a bit nervous when we got there it was nice and clean. The room was clean everyday. We stayed in room number 344 it had two double beds with a bathroom small kitchen and a balcony; Everyone was very nice and polite, helpful. The Motel had a pool, very convenient to everything the beach is located less then half block away and it was beautiful not crowed at all. I give this Motel a rating of 5 stars not for luxury but for their daily rate, service, convenience and cleanness and proximity to the beach. FYI they don't take credit cards over the phone

Reviews.Title: “Great little find with the cleanest rooms and pool.”
Reviews.Author: planefunusa
Reviews.Content: My husband and unmade an impromptu visit to OC just overnite. SeaHawk had the best rates compared to other places on beach side. Located half block from beach. Close walk to beach. Beach not crowded but clean rooms are spacious and very clean and comfortable with updated decor. They send their linens including comforters away to be cleaned . We witnesses this . This family is family owned and takes pride in their property. Everyone encountered was super friendly. I look forward to going back;)

Reviews.Title: “great stay”
Reviews.Author: mommy2boys2011
Reviews.Content: All staff was great!! Upon checking in gave both of my boys a bucket for the sand. It is not far from the beach. Loved the stay here. short drive to the boardwalk. within in walking to distance to many restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!!”
Reviews.Author: Maureen R
Reviews.Content: We loved it here!!! I must say even though this motel had excellent reviews, and I booked it according to that, I was still a little skeptical before we arrived... due to it being a motel and not a hotel!! We were pleasantly surprised!! It was great!!! Very clean, spacious, loved the fact they their was a room divider for some privacy if you wanted to get dressed!! Balcony overlooking the pool!! Walking distance to beach...super friendly staff...excellent house keeping staff!! Bus stop right outside hotel to catch to the boardwalk. Restaurants, stores, miniature golf...All within walking distance!! Matresses could use an upgrade!! I am an early riser and there was always fresh coffee brewing in the office!! I would definately stay here again!!!

Reviews.Title: “Nicely renovated but 'old is old' and not comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: Hooked_on_travel77
Reviews.Content: We find ourselves in the minority here but for some reason the age of this property bothered us. Maybe it was the layout, the paint job, or the horribly slow elevator, but it just wasn't comfortable here. The location right on the busy roadway was certainly not special either. We felt like it was comparable to visiting a relative in a 1970 Florida condo. The room was clean and that is of upmost importance. No issues here. Our room was on the 4th floor and the heat was incredible. The sun just baked on the room's exterior wall. If the a/c had not been working well we could not have stayed. During the summer months make sure your room has a good unit. Our fridge was very weak and could not freeze ice. To make matters worse the motel charges $1.50 for a bag of ice. This doesn't speak well along with the lack of usually supplied bathroom items (no shampoo, etc...). This motel is certainly OK in a pinch but it could never be a destination for us. We would not recommend it unless you are on the tightest of budgets. Older properties can be really inviting but they offer atmosphere. This motel doesn't have that, and while clean, is just 'old'.

Reviews.Title: “Nice sized clean rooms, friendly and attentive staff along with great value makes this a must stay hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Rayhaa281
Reviews.Content: Situated less than a block from the beach this hotel is wonderful. Great value, nice clean rooms, attentive staff, and a pool. Great location and accommodations especially with children. 20 minutes from the boardwalk so it is less busy and there are plenty of restaurants in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Great place!”
Reviews.Author: Debbie C
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I stayed here last weekend for the half marathon in OC. Aside from the fact that it was biker weekend and it was a bit noisy on Friday night (no fault of the hotel!) our stay was great. Our first time at the Seahawk Motel - room was large and CLEAN. We did not have an efficiency but still had a fridge in our room. No complaints at all and looking forward to staying here again in July! Price was so affordable!! It rained on Saturday night so no biker noise....slept like a baby!

Reviews.Title: “Bring the earplugs..”
Reviews.Author: s17young
Reviews.Content: Sea Hawk is very affordable. Being an older establishment, it looks slightly outdated but is definitely worth the money. More than enough to keep you comfortable for the night. The only major problem is the location directly on the highway and the noise from vehicles, specifically loud trucks and motorcycles. I would recommend it for a stay however.

Reviews.Title: “Clean”
Reviews.Author: Milan m
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Sea Hawk Motel for just a few days at the end of August 2011. The rooms were dated but clean. The little kitchenette was a huge bonus! It is located close to the beach, but the whole motel is positioned towards the big street. The huge plus was the North Side Park that's very close (short walk) where we spend every afternoon. Would come back!

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful place for a long weekend.”
Reviews.Author: mcwolfe6
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a long weekend over the Labor Day Weekend and had a wonderful time. The motel is a throw-back to the days when staying at Motels was a traditional way of traveling. The building is very clean and well maintained. It is right along the main street on ocean block in OCMD. We were concerned about the traffic noise but to be honest we didn't even notice. The rooms were comfortable and well equipped (we had an efficiency with kitchen). The pool area was very nice and the beach is a short walk away.The staff was super friendly. We had a wonderful stay and will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great value in Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: sd0453
Reviews.Content: We love the Sea Hawk. This hotel is always clean, and the prices are very reasonable (relative to other hotels in Ocean City). It is only about a block from the beach. The beach near the Sea Hawk is nice and quiet. As for the rooms, they are very spacey and well maintained. Plenty of room for 4 or more in every room. The pool looks nice, although we generally spend most of our time over at the beach. There are gas stations nearby, as well as a few good restaurants. Highly recommended for a nice relaxing trip to Ocean City. Notes: I would say the reason that the sea hawk gets such high reviews on Tripadvisor is because of its value. Clean rooms and low prices, as well as fully functional kitchens in the efficiencies. It Isn't highly rated because it is some 4 or 5 star resort....so don't expect that! That said, it serves its purpose as a great boutique hotel. Also, keep in mind that the operation at this hotel is still very primitive. The hotel didn't give us the option to pay online with a credit card.

Reviews.Title: “AVERAGE BUT CHEAP”
Reviews.Author: phillytom_10
Reviews.Content: Block from the beach. Average hotel but clean. Desk people were very friendly. Bathroom is very very small. Efficiency with stove, oven and refrig. Have stayed there the past 2 years and will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Repeat customers...”
Reviews.Author: Sparky1329
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Sea Hawk in early July, 2010, and liked the place so much we went back in Sept., 2011. The Sea Hawk is an old place but it's well maintained and very clean. We like having the convenience of a kitchenette with a full-sized refrigerator for simple breakfasts and lunch to give your wallet a break. The only thing that would make the accomodations better would be a coffee pot in the unit but there's always fresh coffee available in the office. The beach is a short walk away and you can find everything you need - groceries, restaurants and souvenir shopping - within a few blocks of the Sea Hawk. We'll be heading back there in May, 2012.

Reviews.Title: “Great place & value”
Reviews.Author: maybe09
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at this motel, and were very satisfied. It is well maintained, super clean, and a great location. The staff was friendly and kept the place really nice. Our room was big and very clean. We will return to the Sea Hawk on our next trip to Ocean City.

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean”
Reviews.Author: Duarte1213
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed here and it worked for us. We planned a Labor Day vacation on a shoestring budget, however we didn't want to stay in a grimy dingy place in order to do so. Yes this is a MOTEL, but a very well kept motel. We were very pleased to find it was a 2 minute walk to the beach. The kitchen worked out great, although we did bring our over-sized electric griddle with us, to make sure all the kiddies had their pancakes at a reasonable hour. This was a big cost saver for us. Rather than eat out for every meal, we bought groceries for around $75 for a 5 day stay. Our only gripe was there was no coffee maker in the room! As avid coffee drinkers we were disappointed that we weren't able to just get up and put a pot on an sit out on the balcony. But we managed! Again it was very clean! And the service was great. We left for the beach every day and at one point I had to come back with my son who was in dire need of a nap. I was a little nervous because we had only been gone a little over an hour and we have definitely had hotels in the past where we've been gone 3 hrs and service STILL hasn't cleaned our room (and these were big fancy hotels too!) Well this wasn't the case. I walked up to my room and was releived to see the "Please clean our room now" sign was inside and our room had been taken care of. EVERY DAY they were on top of it. That was a big thing for us! Would we stay here again??? If the price was right, yes. We would like to check out some of the beach front vacation homes - the ones you don't find on Expedia, etc. as it was a little disappointing to watch from our balcony the busy traffic. But I would stay here over staying at the hotels overlooking the beach as we found those were way too expensive just for that option. Overall we were very pleased and their prices made this trip very reasonable for us. They were very clean and the staff was very friendly. I would highly recommend it over any of the other hotels in OC - unless you are looking to spend $300 a night :)

Reviews.Title: “great place!!!! great price!!!!”
Reviews.Author: bar24
Reviews.Content: My husband and I loved it here. Very friendly front desk staff. Walking distance to the beach and many restaurants. Most definately plan on returning here for many more getaways!!

Reviews.Title: “Nice find”
Reviews.Author: Dirdum
Reviews.Content: The Sea Hawk was a pleasant surprise. A small family run motel in Ocean City that looks like it dates back to the ‘50s and even though it may be showing its age a bit, the motel was a nice find at a great price. The efficiency we stayed in had two queen-sized beds and a pullout couch- perfect for two adults and a child. The room was comfortable and clean with plenty of pantry space for food as well as a decent sized frig. The staff were friendly and attentive and were knowledgeable about local shops and restaurants. The beach is just a short walk from the motel, a small block away. The boardwalk is a little further, about 6 miles from the motel. Everything else, supermarket, convenience stores, gift shops and restaurants are close. The pool is tiny and since it sits in the front of the motel by the main drag, a little noisy, but it was also refreshing and well cared for. We enjoyed our short stay at the Sea Hawk and hope to return. It’s a comfortable, clean, affordable accommodation for a small family.

Reviews.Title: “Fits the bill to a T”
Reviews.Author: ibookstore
Reviews.Content: When I was planning my first trip to OC, I was quite surprised to see a motel ranked #1 on TripAdvisor for hotels in OC, the #1 being this one. Motels usually translate to cheap accomodations in my mind, and from my experience. And given today's economy, I needed to save my money. So going on TripAdvisor experience, I booked a night here. It was well worth it! This motel is quite inexpensive (paid $75 for a 2 queen bed room WITH an extra sofa bed). It had a good kitchenette included (pots, pans, stove, microwave, fridge, etc.). Room was decent; comforters were a bit dated, but I wasn't expecting Marriott quality at that price point. It was clean, comfortable, safe. Proximity to the beach was awesome. It literally is a block away from the sand. And u don't cross any major streets. One residential block, and you're there. To top it off, the lady who booked us in gave my 2 kids 2 free beach pails & shovels. Excellent , friendly staff. I compared the price of the #2 hotel on TA, and that was like $300. The Seahawk's location is also very good for families. Since it is a bit north of the big big hotel properties with thousands of rooms, the area of the beach you are near is not as crowded, I believe, as the parts closer south to the Boardwalk. And driving from SeaHawk to the south area (Boardwalk area) was only a pleasant 10 min. drive down Coastal Highway. Without a doubt, if we go to OC again, we will book again with this well tended beach motel. I'm used to 4-star hotels, and if I need/want that level, and willing to pay for it, I'm sure I would ... but for a quick trip to the beach wit h the kids, this motel fits the bill to a T!

Reviews.Title: “Great Clean Family Motel”
Reviews.Author: pennstfan
Reviews.Content: This place is an excellent family run motel at a reasonable price.... PERIOD ! We have FINALLY found a great place for us to come back to Ocean City every summer as we have been doing for over 30 years. Some of the old motels need improvements so we don't go back.......not this one! We loved it....friendly helpful staff...My wife only returns to CLEAN and comfortable hotels.....We WILL BE BACK next summer.

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and spacious”
Reviews.Author: JoKur6207
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Sea Hawk for 3 nights in the beginning of August. It was very clean and comfortable. At check-in they even gave our 3 year old a little bucket and shovel for the beach. Parking was great... we never had trouble finding a spot when returning to the motel. It's located right along the highway, but our room was actually very quiet. We didn't even hear the people in neighboring rooms. We would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Really nice, non-chain hotel in Ocean City. We'd definitely go back!”
Reviews.Author: theaquitaine
Reviews.Content: There's nothing fancy about The Sea Hawk Motel, but it is clean and the owners and staff are really nice and accommodating. We had a second floor room -- I think it was quieter than being on the ground floor. Rooms are big -- no problem for our family of four. New comforters on the beds were cheery. The bathroom was dated but spotless. It's not close to the boardwalk, so you'll have to drive to for restaurants and attractions, but we didn't find it a big problem, even during the summer season.

Reviews.Title: “Unusually clean for a beach motel and good location”
Reviews.Author: tag1000
Reviews.Content: I found the Sea Hawk Motel online and liked the location, the price, and the good reviews I read. Still, I wasn't expecting much and I was very pleasantly surprised. The motel was exceptionally well maintained for an older motel, with fresh paint, everything clean and no musty beach motel smell. The grounds were well-tended, with flowers and shrubbery everywhere. The efficiency contained two double beds separating by a folding curtain from the living room section with double sofa bed. The kitchen was adequate, although it contained minimal dishes, utensils and pots. The bathroom could have used a fan, but the window could be opened for airing it after showers. The pool was small but pleasant, with plenty of lounges and chairs. The staff was pleasant, and there was always coffee available in the office. The location, 125th on the ocean side of Coastal Hwy was pleasant and very convenient as long as you didn't want to go downtown to the Ocean City boardwalk.

Reviews.Title: “Way beyond our expectations!!”
Reviews.Author: hobwacked
Reviews.Content: This is an older motel that has been extremely well cared for. The outside looks great, the grounds are clean, plenty of off street parking, and only a short walk to the beach. The staff from front desk to housekeeping, were all friendly and very accomodating. We stayed in a 4th floor room. Extremely spacious, plenty of room for my family of 5. Nice balcony overlooking the pool. The room was cleaned immaculately. The carpet is new and the bedspreads and drapes are in great condition. The bathroom was spotless. We usually try to come to OC on a Friday to beat the Bay Bridge Saturday traffic. This motel gave us the option for a one night stay at a very affordable rate. I hope to stay here every year, it is a wonderful place!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous Stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: jmj1016
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Sea Hawk for 3 nights. Everything was great from the clean rooms to the very friendly helpful staff. The hotel is just a 1/2 block from the beach which was great. I would recommend staying in this hotel. We would absolutley come back again.

Reviews.Title: “we enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: fugleymen
Reviews.Content: rooms were clean staff was nice parking was not that bad we parked on street by choice

Reviews.Title: “Sea Hawk - soars above the rest!”
Reviews.Author: KTT14
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Sea Hawk for 6 nights. Originally we only booked for 5 - but it was no trouble to add an additional night. The staff we're extremely helpful and accomodated for the 3 year old in our party. Our rooms were immaculate, and were cleaned to a very high standard each day. The swimming pool area was always clean, and the beds and tables were cleaned every morning. The location was only a couple of blocks from the beach, but you could see it from the landing. There were lots of great eateries around, and the staff we're really helpful with calling places and providing directions, of nearby places. Although we were two families, consisting of 5 adults and 1 child and we can honestly say we have all travelled extensively through the USA, and this was definitely one of our most favourite hotels ever!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place, awesome price, bad beds, otherwise perfect!”
Reviews.Author: Matchgame90
Reviews.Content: We booked our room based on the good reviews on TripAdvisor plus the fact that the rates were unbelievably cheap for what you get. I'll admit it, I was nervous as heck that the place would be a sleazy hotel or it would be unsafe or have undesirable "neighbors" staying next to us. But all these worries went away as soon as we checked in and saw our room. We got a room that has the kitchenette for $131 a night right in the middle of the busiest part of the summer season. To get a room this close to the beach for that cheap seems unreal but the reviews are true. The kitchen is a 7/8 scale normal kitchen with a full size fridge. Definitely a good setup for saving money by having your own meals and snacks available in your room versus going out. We had a room with two double beds and a pull out sofa-bed. It was a very comfortable room and to say it was clean is an understatement. This place is honestly spotless, I've stayed in plenty of hotels for business and pleasure and this has to be the cleanest and most thorough maids I've experienced. There were plenty of towels available along with a nicely stocked kitchen. When we first arrived in our room we noticed two of the lamps had bulbs that had burned out. I had asked the front desk on our way out to dinner that evening if I could have 2 bulbs to replace the burned out ones. The guy at the front desk was extremely apologetic (practically falling over himself saying he was so sorry that wasn't noticed before we arrived) and put them in right then and there. He later checked to make sure everything was ok --- I haven't been treated this well in Hiltons or Wyndhams. The reviews were true about the shower temperature not staying constant but that's honestly not a huge deal to me. We had a room on the bottom floor right by the pool. We walked right out our sliding door into the pool each morning and enjoyed a nice, quiet and relaxing morning in the sun each day. Yes, its right off the main drag but its not that noisy. Plenty of parking and definitely family-friendly. Be sure to bring shampoo/conditioner/lotion. All they provide is hand soap. Also bring paper towels and/or old dish rags to do dishes. They provided one dish rag but it isn't enough to keep up (but that's just us) Pros: Price Price Price Price VERY roomy FREE High speed internet that's reliable and actually speedy Nice pool Kitchen Very clean Less than a 5 minute walk to the beach. Plenty of parking Cons: The beds are much too soft for anybody over 200 pounds, let alone 2 people. I actually slept on the sofa the one night due to being used to a firmer mattress. I can't believe somebody compared this place to a Hilton. You pay dirt cheap prices and get a ton. It isn't that modern looking but its clean. I didn't notice any sort of musty or mildew-y smell that some others had mentioned. Honestly, I'd rather stay here that a more-expensive hotel. It has a home-away-from-home feel you don't get from the standardized chain-hotels have. Definitely going to come back!

Reviews.Title: “Classic Old-School Ocean City Hotel with Modern Updates”
Reviews.Author: Skye23
Reviews.Content: I used to spend at least a week or two a summer in OC growing up, family friend's owned a hotel down on the boardwalk and much of my youth was spent sticky and sandy running back and forth between Fisher's Popcorn, Dolle's Candy and Kohr Brother's frozen custard stands. I shudder to think how much of my childhood money went to the amusement parks down by the pier. But as time passes more and more of the things I remembered are gone - the hotel I knew every square inch of - now towering condos. Enter the Sea Hawk...While located up in Northern OC beyond the Boardwalk's flashing lights and noise, it hits all the right notes for an OC hotel. Its close to the beach, the rooms are spacious and comfortable, it has a small pool for those times when you don't want to venture out on the sands but still want the sun and water. We stayed in one of the 4th floor motel rooms and therefore I can't comment on the efficiency rooms but I'm sure they're well suited to the task. After all, you shouldn't be trying to cook fancy meals at a beach hotel, you just need a fridge big enough to store drinks and milk for your cereal and perhaps some leftovers. If you're feeling very industrious you could throw some lunch meat and cheese in it for sandwiches as well. Even my room had a fridge large enough for all that. We also had two large beds, a good deal of space to toss our luggage around, a comfy sofa bed that could be closed off from the rest of the room with a folding screen, a nice large tv, wireless internet access which we were too tired to use the 1 night we were there, and a roomy balcony. The bathroom was reasonably spacious and clean, the air conditioning worked well. We didn't try the pool but it looked very inviting. The staff is also very friendly and helpful, as you would expect from a family-owned hotel. One thing for people to remember is - this is a vacation town. Yes, this hotel costs more then you would pay for the same type of hotel elsewhere. But its also 1/2 block to the beach in a town where you can pay several hundred dollars for a room that really doesn't offer much if anything more. Yes its a bit older, but its lovingly cared for. You will have everything you need with some money left over for you to try one of those outrageously priced seafood buffets, even if you rent the rooms with a kitchen.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Stay in Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: Lucytwo259
Reviews.Content: This was our third stay at the Sea Hawk Motel. With each stay it seems to get better. The grounds are well kept, the rooms clean and well attended and the staff are friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “It was a good place, nice place,quiet”
Reviews.Author: Andy_in_VA
Reviews.Content: Wonderful! The people at the desk were nice. Only problem was TV didn't work.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Hmangeri
Reviews.Content: Great service! A little older but clean! Super close to the ocean and no problems with parking at all. Seems very family friendly as well. Great value for the price! We would say here again!

Reviews.Title: “Old but clean”
Reviews.Author: Sparky1329
Reviews.Content: My husband and I booked for three nights in July after reading all the positive feedback on this site. This motel is obviously old but it is refurbished. It's also very clean. The staff is friendly and courteous. There was clean bedding and plenty of towels provided every single day we were there. The location is perfect for those who don't plan to "live" in their room. Because of the full-sized fridge, stove and sink preparing breakfast and lunch was a snap. Shops, restaurants and the beach are well within walking distance for a disabled person like me. We would definiitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Can not wait until next summer..”
Reviews.Author: dyana95
Reviews.Content: Went to OC for a weeks' vacation with my husband and son and his family. Had a great time. This was the first time I stayed in an efficiency. The room was large, very clean and had a full kitchen including full size fridge and 4 burner stove. This certainly saved us money for other things! The front desk ladies were great in giving us ideas of places to go and things to do. The cleaning ladies were extremely efficient and left us extra towels and a blanket with no fuss. I cannot wait to go there again next summer, hopefully for 2 weeks this time.

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a great price!!”
Reviews.Author: fairydusst1028
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 4 nights during the Labor Day holiday. We got a room with a kitchen. It was great for the price. Everything is in walking distance, great restaurants, parks, shopping and the beach!! Our room overlooked the pool and Coastal Highway. It was nice to sit out and relax. The staff was extremly nice. The first thing we noticed when we got to our room was how clean it was. It even smelled clean and not musty like a lot of hotels smell. the kitchen was nice and had most essentials. It had a toaster, hand can opener, pots & pans and enough silverware, plates and bowles for 6 people. I will say if you are planning to cook a lot I would bring more pans and some extra bowles. You get 3 pots and one medium pan. It was alittle difficult to cook for 4 adults but we made due. The room did not have a coffee maker but they did have coffee in the motel office. Everytime our room was cleaned we were always given a lot of towels, even a new dish towel everyday. The room did not come with toilitries (like some hotels supply) except soap so you have to make sure to bring your own shampoo. The pool was nice, it wasnt too big but it was just right. It was nice to have parking right outside our room. We liked the place a lot and look forward to staying there again!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and very friendly.”
Reviews.Author: poorpeenie
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Sea Hawk For one night only because we were booked at another hotel but wanted to go a day early and our hotel was full so we called and got a room at the sea Hawk.We were greeted in the office by a very nice,and friendly lady.We wnet to our room and it was very clean and had everything we needed.It looks small and like an older hotel but was clean and everyone was friendly and the pool was cute and also very clean.We would stay again and the location is good, yes it is on the highway but we always bring a fan with us to drown out noise so we had no noise issues.Please give it a try.For the price and location it is clean and very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Overnight at The Sea hawk Motel”
Reviews.Author: Navymom43
Reviews.Content: Just spent a wonderful night at the Sea hawk Motel in Ocean City. We normally rent a condo when we go to OC, so renting a motel room was a little scary for us. We are so lucky to have been recommended the Sea hawk. We went for one night on Labor Day weekend and it couldn't have been better. From the early check-in to the full use of facilities after check-out, it was great. The motel allowed us full use of the pool, bathroom, and parking eventhough we had checked out. They even gave us a bag to put our wet clothes in for the ride home. The room are very clean and spacious and well taken care of. I never would have expected a flat screen TV with HBO for such a reasonable rate. If you ever want to do a quick getaway to OC stay at the Sea Hawk Motel!

Reviews.Title: “Ahh finally...its CLEAN, comfortable, walk to beach & nice staff”
Reviews.Author: bythepark
Reviews.Content: ok look, here's the deal when you are talking Ocean City, MD. there are no 5 star hotels, period. I don’t even think there are any 4 star hotels there. the Hyatt might claim to be up there but the place is massive and just a nightmare. so at this point you come down to a few key elements and this place has it. first is first, in a town like this your number one priority, is the place CLEAN?! yes, it was – from the bathroom (they still put clean strips across the toilet!) to the carpet & living area. the location is fabulous, maybe 25 steps to the beach with plenty of parking for guests. its that old style place, only 4 stories with a smallish pool that fronts the main drag – I didn’t go it in, but plenty of people looked like they enjoyed it. I like that it’s farther north (not too far from Fenwick) so its quieter and the beach isn’t as crowded, more condo’s are around it than other hotels. in general the place was clean & quiet. I also liked that they would just rent me Friday night. only a few places even had availability and many would only rent for both nights. it’s not the most modern place but they did have flat panel TV, pretty new looking carpet, lots of towels in the room (although the thinner type like you might get at the gym) and the beds were pretty comfortable. as far as I was concerned this place the best hotel I have ever stayed in OC.

Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: BATAP
Reviews.Content: We just got back from Seahawk Motel , OC 2 days ago. Was almost disappointed when they said over when booking, that I will pay $185 per night; I saw on the site that the most expensive room was $175. The phone service charges are questionable. Also, after the first night, room was not properly cleaned; beside that everything was ok. My wife liked the kitchen . My kids had fun in the pool. Front desk very professional. I will definitely refer this motel to someone, and surely come again. Civil, New Jersey.

Reviews.Title: “worth my while”
Reviews.Author: shoresearcher
Reviews.Content: Room was clean and comfortable.. Fresh sheets and towels everyday, overall was worth my stay however needs new appliances and better water pressure. But yes very friendly and excellent services. Just a walk from the beach, especially great for the price.. Quiet and comfortable.. Small pool but very clean.. We would deffinetly stay again..

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Visit”
Reviews.Author: FishGirl5
Reviews.Content: This is the second year that we stayed at the Sea Hawk Motel for our "Girls Getaway." We chose the efficiency so we could make breakfasts & lunches in the room to save money. The hotel is a good value for Ocean City. The fixtures are not super-modern, so don't expect a five-star hotel here. What makes it great is that it is CLEAN-CLEAN-CLEAN!!! Plus, it's a 2 minute walk to the beach (on the ocean side of the main road running through the city). And there's plenty of on-site parking. The staff is very friendly too. Will stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel”
Reviews.Author: cumer64
Reviews.Content: We just came back from Ocean City, had a wonderful time. The motel was great, the management and the hospitality staff were wonderful. The hotel was spotless,well taken care of. Had a wonderful time.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: beachgurl2011
Reviews.Content: This motel was a great deal for the money. The rooms were spacious and fit the 4 of us perfectly. It was nice to have a kitchenette in our room, so we could fix breakfast and lunch. The bathroom was small and the water pressure was horrible on the shower. The beds, including the pull out sofa bed was comfortable. It was nice to have the divider to seperate the room at night. We loved having the huge table to eat and play cards on. The motel has free wi-fi, but doesn't advertise it on the website. Everything was super clean! You can't beat the location, with just a short walk to the beach it made it easier to lug everything over. Also, it was right across the street from Sunsations and Dumser's. We will definitely stay here again next year!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, affordable and great location. We loved it!”
Reviews.Author: ocd-vacationer
Reviews.Content: After searching online for weeks it seemed, I finally decided on the Sea Hawk motel. I was impressed with its high ratings and affordable price. I didn't need luxury, but I wanted friendly service and a cozy, comfortable and CLEAN efficiency room in a non-smoking motel. The Sea Hawk turned out to be the perfect place. The kitchen had a full size refrigerator, microwave, apartment stove/oven and sink. It was equipped with a toaster, several sizes of pans for cooking, silverware, and dishes. You can request a coffee maker from the front desk (which we did). The room was large and had 2 queen beds and a double sofa bed. There was absolutely NO musty smell whatsoever, which really turns me off to a motel room (I even brought disinfectant and deodorizing spray with me just in case, but I had no reason to use it). I traveled with my husband and family (my kids are in their early 20s) and we all would stay there again in a heartbeat. I would advise bringing a mattress pad or perhaps a blow-up mattress if you plan to use the sofa bed though. My son slept on it and said it was uncomfortable (The mattress on it is very thin - nothing that we can't fix next time around.) I think you can request a rollaway bed also, so you might want to check into that option. The motel's location is fantastic. You don't have to cross the Coastal Highway to get to the beach, you can just walk through a parking lot and you're there! We liked that it was away from the noise of the boardwalk, and yet just a few minutes drive away. The beach was clean and the area was very family oriented. We also liked the fact that there is an outdoor shower so you can rinse the sand off before coming into the motel or before leaving the motel for home. They have a bathroom that you can use after you check out, so you can still enjoy the beach and have a place to shower and change before heading home from Ocean City. If you are looking for a 'home away from home' atmosphere, the Sea Hawk is just the place. We will definately stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “My last minute decision.... was a great decision”
Reviews.Author: needavacationPa
Reviews.Content: For starts--I called two days prior to arriving July 3rd and was able to make reservations! The hotel representative was very accomodating and helpful. Service was very good, and the room was very clean. The refrigerator was fresh, no stale odor. The kitchenette and the utensils were also clean. It was nice to have cups, plates & silverware available for use. Beds were comfortable to sleep in. We ( two children & three adults) stay for two nights. The pool was always crowed, so we went to the beach! Finally, I stayed at the Seahawk because a friend recommended it to me. I am glad my last minute decision was a great decision.

Reviews.Title: “think about before staying”
Reviews.Author: beachlovers98Pa
Reviews.Content: We go to Ocean city every year. Sometimes twice a year!! We always stay for at least seven days!! I was in the mood for a change of a hotel.. This place had good reviews and we tried it out!! The place was clean!! Staff was friendly!! We although got locked out of our room out on the balcony.. Yes, on the balcony!!! We were stock out there for about two hours. I had little children (3, 8, and 10 in the room sleeping).. I had to yell at someone on the street to get help!! It took the office about another 25 minutes.. Till this time it was 2:30 in the morning.. My niece (15), Friend (15), and myself were traped!!! I went down to the office in the morning and they had a hundred excuses and never said they were sorry.. We had family come and visit us on and off in the hotel and they yelled at us for having to many people in the room.. They would come and go to the beach with us or boardwalk.. They never spent the night!! The bottom of the pool has really sharp points and your children will get cut!! We had three cuts and we only swim in the pool for about 20 minutes every day.. We go for the beach!! The maids come to your room and clean it awesome!!! The place is clean but, I'll stick with our normal place.. Would never have these issues there.. The bottom line is the place is clean and family welcome..

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: pajeffers2
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had a wonderful time in this motel. The price was a bit pricey but it was right before the 4th of July weekend. We will most likley look foward to coming back during the off holiday weekend. The room were comfortable and they also had a stove, burners, microwave ect. The reason why they do so well is because they have fully staffed maids that do a wonderful Job!! The clean everything and if you want to leave a tip they leave a little envolpe in the room for you. The front Desk host were very nice and they were well aware of fishing spots and restraunt spots..that is a plus in our book. The beach was in walking distance along with a beautiful park across the street!

Reviews.Title: “Clean hotel with helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: lishi8983
Reviews.Content: We had a great 2-night stay at The Sea Hawk this past weekend. The staff advised us on where to eat and how to get to Assateague, etc. The room was very clean and the stuff in it didn't look old and musty, as is the case with many of the beach motels I'm used to. Our room was pretty quiet, despite the fact that the motel is situated right on a busy street. The beach is only one block away, and it is a very nice one, possibly because it is far (5 miles) from the busy boardwalk area.

Reviews.Title: “What an unexpected surprise!!!”
Reviews.Author: EthnicTresses
Reviews.Content: Because bottom line, who expects much from a motel. Our family planned our summer vacation at the last moment. My husband was doing a ton research for almost two days trying to find a last minute vacation spot for us (husband, wife, 5 year old boy). We had settled on renting a condo in Jersey (we live in Nyack, NY). But we still were not comfortable paying a large amount of money for staying somewhere for last than a week. So my husband decided to do some more searching and eventually his search paid off. He ended up reading some reviews on Ocean City, MD and how it can be an excellent trip for families and then he landed on trip advisor. Basically the rest was history. The sea hawk MOTEL was ranked #3 (and is still ranked #3) out of 103 places. We were amazed at that, the reviews are basically all positive, the price is unbelievable, you have an option of choosing a regular motel room or an efficiency (we chose the latter), AND the motel is on the ocean side (a 1/2 block away). We were sold!!! We had absolutely NO issues while staying there and we met a lot of lovely families that had made the motel there yearly family spot. The host was really nice and the cleaning ladies did an excellent job. Everything was super clean. We had a first floor room with a view of the strip and the pool to our right. We could be on the beach within 5 minutes. We could still enjoy a home cooked meal if we wanted to. And with a full sized refrigerator, options are endless. Drinks are always cold, we always had plenty of ice to pack the coolers, there's no limit on what you can make (food and drink wise:) and we always packed our lunches the night before we headed to the beach. A final reason why we chose this motel is because we did not want to be too close to the boardwalk. We felt that the closer that we would get to the boardwalk, the more of a chance we would be around loud neighbors. Which for some people, they would not mind. But since we have a little boy, that was important also. Overall, the stay was excellent and we have already booked our room for our summer trip this year and we are even staying longer this time!!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean & Comfortable”
Reviews.Author: BronxGirl1
Reviews.Content: I really didn't expect much from this place because it was cheaper than some of the motels I "knew" were dumps. I can assure you that this place more than pleasantly surprised me. Check-in was a breeze which usually isn't the case especially when you're 1.5 hours early--"Not a problem, all the rooms are ready"--try that at the Hilton. We had a third floor efficiency that was much larger than I anticipated & had a literal kitchen with a FULL sized fridge. The 2 Queen beds were firm & clean. The TV & remote worked perfectly as did the drain in the shower---2 huge problem spots that they passed with flying colors. The rooms don't have a coffee maker but as I found out when I asked they have them in the office--you just have to ask for one. The bathroom was super clean & believe me I check. The towels weren't the biggest but they were fresh & clean. All in all I had no real complaints at all. Sure it's not on the boardwalk or oceanfront but I also stayed here for 3 nights for less than 1 night would have costed me down there or on the water. It suited our needs & then some and the staff were fun people. I'll be back....

Reviews.Title: “Stay away just disgusting”
Reviews.Author: ocboy300
Reviews.Content: This place is dirty and moldy. I felt like I was in a dungeon. The beds were uncomfortable and with old worn out sheets. I haved been going to OC for many years and this place is the worst. I can't believe they are ranked so high. The only explanation is that the owners friends and relatives must write in. What a let down. JUST STAY AWAY!!

Reviews.Title: “Sure Worked for us!!!”
Reviews.Author: Bronx_NYJim_L
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Sea Hawk a few days last week and found it to be very guest friendly, exceptionally clean, and VERY affordable. Unlike the previous reviewer we found not only wasn't it damp & musty but quite dry & fresh. We've stayed at quite a few much more expensive motels in OC over the years & some of them are stale & literally smell like Assawoman Bay at ultra low tide. The efficiency was adequately equiped for light cooking but with all the eateries in this town I can't imagine that you'd waste your time in a kitchen. The beds were plenty firm, the sheets (yes with an "s") were fresh & clean as were the plentiful towels that miraculously appeared within minutes of leaving the room--the staff is seasoned, friendly & very responsive. All in all it's a very nice place & the price is more than right. The rooms are big, there's plenty of chairs by the pool & the owners aim to please. What more can you really a$k for?

Reviews.Title: “Felt like a basement - moldy & mildew”
Reviews.Author: scharf
Reviews.Content: First off I can't believe this hotel has such high ratings. We stayed for a weekend in September because all the reviews said it was such a great place. As soon as I walked in I felt like I was stuck in a basement. Looking around the decor is outdated, the place was clean, but the ceilings are a tad low. The beds are way to soft, very uncomfortable and they only had one sheet plus the comforter. There is a folding curtain separating the sitting area from the beds, but I'm not sure it would block out any noise or light if you wanted to separate the two areas. We kept the air conditioning on all the time to try and air out the room. The place smelled of mildew and there was mold in the room that caused us both to be very congested the whole time. I have stayed in four other hotels in ocean city and I would definitely not return to the sea hawk. It was clean on the surface, but I didn't feel like touching anything in the room. I'm not that picky and I don't mind staying in budget motels, but this place wasn't worth it and in my opinion is rated way to high on tripadvisor.

Reviews.Title: “Terrific value and exceptionally clean!”
Reviews.Author: nafwill77
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to OC and after reading many reviews on hotels/motels, we decided on the Sea Hawk because everyone kept saying how clean it was and this is very important to me in a stay. We were not disappointed in the least. The rooms were extremely clean and I have high standards. We had a full kitchen in our room, although we didn't use it except to keep drinks in the fridge. The matresses could use some updating as they were a bit uncomfortable. The motel is only about a half a block to the beach which I found much less crowded and almost cozier than the beach front along the boardwalk. We drove to the boardwalk as it's definitely not within walking distance, but we didn't mind the few minute drive and didn't have a problem finding parking. The motel staff was very friendly and courteous as well as helpful. One minor problem came on our last night there when we had a knock on our door at 2am from a drunk guest from the floor below who was ranting about someone throwing liquid on her husband from above. She kept my husband at the door for 20 min just blabbering. Anyway, I alerted the staff the next morning and they informed me that the couple had already been evicted. Final note - we will definitely be back next year with our kiddos to enjoy the Sea Hawk and OC!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Motel in Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: KCashVa
Reviews.Content: We booked the Sea Hawk motel 8/24/09 - 8/29/09. We were a group of 13 and booked 4 efficiencies on the 3rd floor. We were all very satisfied. The efficiencies are not huge, but it worked for our family of 3. The rooms were very clean. The bedspread and shower curtain were changed daily along with sheets and towels. The beds were very comfortable. The kitchen had everything we needed except a coffee maker, so we brought our own from home. Not a problem. The pool area is very clean and nice, but a little noisy since it's right on the highway. The only area I noticed that needed attention was the entry to the elevator. The ashtray was always overflowing. Not a huge deal. There was plenty of parking. There are several restaurants/shops within walking distance which is very nice. The staff were super nice and always helpful when we needed something (like an extra blanket). The price is very reasonable. We will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel. Friendly and clean!”
Reviews.Author: peacegirl123
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Sea Hawk Motel for the second time this summer and it was just as great as the first time. Me and my family all love it. First of all, the employees at the hotels are just very friendly and nice. Too the rooms are very clean and very practical because of the little kitchen(refrigerator , microwave and Oven). The pool is very clean and hot. The only things at the hotel that could of been better is that the water from the shower was getting cold and then extremily hot, the pool is closing at 8 o'clock(too early). Over all the hotel was fun and i would recommend it to anybody.

Reviews.Title: “OK for a short visit, but only if you are desperate to save a little $$”
Reviews.Author: Tegemeister
Reviews.Content: This motel, located on 125th St in Ocean City is currently rated at #2 in terms of popularity on travel advisor. Based on our experience, this past 4 nights, I dont think it belongs in the top 20. The low daily rate of $155 per night was the main draw admittedly, and the rooms were cleaned daily and the grounds were clean. This is a family run motel, and so the front office was friendly and helpful, but the rooms were small, outdated, the beds not firm enough for anyone over 200 lbs, the clientele sometimes not the best (our boogie board and beach chair were stolen from our front door overnight.), and our car was also keyed in the parking lot. I am not sure if this was just a random teenager or what, but in any case, this is not what I expect when I go on vacation to a nice hotel at the beach resort of Ocean CIty, MD. Let me say that in previous stays in Ocean CIty, that we stayed at the Hilton, whose rooms are almost brand new and three times the size of the Sea Hawk. Yes, the Hilton is more than three times the price of the Sea Hawk Motel, but is more than three times as nice as well in terms of size, view privacy and amenities. The Hilton is a hotel where you hate to leave. In contrast, we could not wait to check out of the Sea Hawk Hotel.. The Sea Hawk Hotel's only pool is adjacent to Coastal Highway and is really too small to be considered usable. In fact, its dimensions are no more than 20 x 30 feet. and 5 feet deep at the deep end. The Sea Hawk does have a 1.5 block walk to the beach at 125th st., but at least it is on oceanside. Also, the Sea Hawk does not have laundry facilities, so be prepared to use a laundromat, and bring your own toulet paper, paper towels, and can opener. The kitchen in the efficiency is rudimentary at best, and you will find yourself eating out almost every night., because the kitchen and related cooking equipment is not the same as what you are used to at home. On the plus side, the Sea Hawk is located across the street from a brand new all you can eat crab house, called Old Mill Crab House. Old MIll is expensive, but if you are hungry for blue crabs, you will enjoy the dinner. With the money you save by staying at the Sea Hawk you can definitely afford to eat out, so if you dont mind roughing it in an average non full service hotel, stay here at the Sea Hawk, and have extra money for eating out, or whatever else you like to do. If, on the other hand, you value quiet, privacy, ocean views, full service, no crime, safes in room, awesome pools, better location, but higher rates, stay at the Hilton. I think next time I will save my money for the Hilton. Hope this review helps everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Clean & frendily”
Reviews.Author: treedoctor3
Reviews.Content: I have been going to Ocean City for most of my life. We had met some new friends while travailing to Chicago. They came out with their two teen girls this summer for a visit. The girls had never been in the ocean before so the trip was a big one for them. We have stayed in many places over the years and some of the hotels, even the big ones have not always been very clean. This place was just what the other reviewers had said, older hotel, but great service and very clean. They even let us check in at 11:00. There was plenty of parking and the walk to the beach was very short. We plan on staying here every time we come to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Nice motel, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: LMatis10
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Sea Hawk motel for a week and it was great. The staff was friendly and the room was very clean and spacious. The walk to the beach was very short and there was no street to cross because we went out of the back of the motel. I thought that it was going to be noisy because it is located on Coastal Highway which is a very busy road, but it was surprisingly quiet. The private balcony was great - we sat out there every night and watched the cars drive by! The motel is not near the boardwalk, but there were plenty of stores, shops, and restaurants within walking distance. And the few times we drove to the boardwalk, we were able to find on-street free parking. The only negative thing I could say is that a few times when I was taking a shower, the water temperature was not consistent. Although, in a motel there are a lot of people using the water at the same time so I wasn't too surprised when it happened. Overall, it was a great trip and we would definitely go back to the Sea Hawk motel!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel and a modest price”
Reviews.Author: bigbuster885
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this property for one night to attend the Springfest. The room was more than adequate for the 2 of us, it had a stove, fridge, microwave, 2 beds and sleeper sofa. Not a fancy room but the room is not priced that way either. It was the opening of the season and they were still painting the outside which did not interfere with our stay. The road noise was somewhat bothersome but one would expect road noise since it is located on Ocean highway. The room was clean, the bathroom a tad small, the water was hot, the towels could use some upgrading, they were a bit small and worn. This hotel worked for us for a short stay and on a similar trip we would come back. The staff was friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean and well kept Motel”
Reviews.Author: Javaone06
Reviews.Content: My wife is very picky about the Hotel, but she gave a thumb up for this motel. It's clean and well kept. We stayed during the Cruiser Weekend Oct, 2008 at Ocean city.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable”
Reviews.Author: funinthesun008
Reviews.Content: We stayed 5 days last year and 7 days this year. The efficency was very comfortable and clean. The location is close to the beach and restaurants. We definitely would recommend this motel. The staff is very friendly. We will come back without a doubt.

Reviews.Title: “10+++”
Reviews.Author: Eaglesaddict
Reviews.Content: Stayed there only for one night but what a wonderful experience. Great reviews from Tripadvisor don't do it enough justice. Felt like Southern hospitality with a clean, comfortable room and super location that you won't have to get in your car. Must go to donut shop (Fractured Prune) on 127th st. Hopefully will have a room available when we go back to OC.

Reviews.Title: “such a great place”
Reviews.Author: joenjulwhite
Reviews.Content: i just came back from here again and i must say i was just as pleased as every time. the staff is wonderful and i love it here. the kids have a ball. its so close to the beach everything is within walking distance and i would rather not stay anywhere else. this place is clean and just perfect.. The staff is more friendly here than the 3oo dollar a night hotels. i love it...

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay!”
Reviews.Author: LN01
Reviews.Content: The Sea Hawk was a great place to stay in Ocean City. We stayed for 2 nights in one of the efficiencies, and we had plenty of room, a full size fridge, and a pull out couch. The place was very clean and close to many places to eat. Definitely will stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Happy with our Stay”
Reviews.Author: SpydersGirl
Reviews.Content: My husband and I booked the Seahawk based on the reviews given here on Tripadvisor. We were very pleased with our stay. Our room was extremely clean and well taken care of, as was the entire facility. The staff was very welcoming and friendly. The price was just right for us. We were also happy about the location. It's a very short walk to the beach (5 minutes tops). The beach was beautiful and very quiet -- almost secluded --at least it was when we were on it. It is not near the boardwalk, but that is no problem because you can either drive to it or take the Ocean City bus for $2 (this fare allows you to ride the buses all day long). The motel is located near several good restaurants and amusements. We will stay here again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “A great choice”
Reviews.Author: uijd
Reviews.Content: The Sea Hawk is a great place to stay for a family to stay in Ocean City -- for a very reasonable price. The folks at the hotel are extremely helpful and accommodating. The rooms are spacious and clean. You won’t be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Great Getaway”
Reviews.Author: stargazers04
Reviews.Content: We chose Sea Hawk for the location and based the decision on the reviews. It was excellent. The staff was very friendly, the location was great, every morning we crossed the street to the bay and walked the trail at the rec center. The location offered alot around it and not the congestion of the boardwalk crowd. If we wanted boardwalk, all we had to do was hail the bus outside and for $2.00 we could go back and forth to the boardwalk. The room itself was spacious,we fit 4 comfortably, clean and well stocked. In ebay terminology, this is a definite, do over!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely True!!!”
Reviews.Author: meldan5
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay!!!! We saw the great reviews and decided to try it out. Almost didn't want to share our experience, wanted to keep this a secret for fear of not getting a room in the future. But if this can help a family on a budget like us it's worth it. One of the cleanest motels(no-it is the cleanest!!) I have ever stayed in at O.C. MD!!!!! Close walk to Beach for our 3 small children. Great pool for our children - who are learning to swim. Really nice to have the room divider too. Definately will try to stay there everytime we visit this beach.

Reviews.Title: “Good Find !”
Reviews.Author: Ksti99
Reviews.Content: We don't often visit O.City, MD often during "Peak" Season due to the outrageous rates at many hotels. I was pleasantly surprised to find the Sea Hawk with reasonable rates, and they didn't require a 3 night minimum like many others do during the summer. So after checking the reviews on this website, I decided to give it a try. Located down on 124th street it is away from all the hustle and bustle of the boardwalk, and still within a block to the beach. Mini golf, Sunsations, Dairy Queen, Dough Roller & Dump. Dairyland right across the street which is great since you don't have to hop in the car and drive. Make Note it's not a 5 Star Hotel, and if that is what you're looking for than this is not the place for you. We stayed on the 4th floor. Our room had 2 double beds, w/ a sleep sofa and mini fridge. The room was very clean, linens clean, and beds weren't too bad either (pretty bouncy and soft). I am a clean freak especially when it comes to the bathroom and it was definately up to standards. Be sure to bring your toiletries since they don't provide them. (except for a mini bar hand soap on the sink). They do however have hair dryers in the bathrooms which was a nice bonus. Aside from the room, the hotel has 1 elevator (kind of slow, but it works), and a small-medium size pool. Was cleaned each day we were there :) Overall - if you are looking for a clean, affordable room, close to beach without lots of added amenities, this will work for you. The staff is very nice & helpful! I'll be happy to return next year ! ! !

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: MyOpinon6380
Reviews.Content: Very nice, Very clean. We booked this hotel based solely on the positive reviews on this site and the price, so i though i would thank those who gave truthful reviews and add some thoughts of my own. We reserved an efficiency room and were not dissappointed. When we arrived, there was parking, the staff was very nice and the room was extremely clean. I couldn't find a single thing wrong with it. There is a full refrigerator and sink, stove and oven. They provide dishes, silverware, even dish soap! The bathroom is kinda small, and the water goes from hot to cold, but you'll find that at any hotel. The pool was very nice and clean, but always full of kids when i tried to go :( They have free coffee in the office in the morning. The staff comes during the day and makes the beds and puts our fresh towels and doesn't disturb you're personal belongings! The only thing i disliked was being on the first floor we didn't get one of the cool balconies to sit on as our door dumped right into the parking lot... You are less than a block from the beach, which is also very nice. If this is your first trip to OC, be aware that this hotel is on 124th St. Although you are on the coastal highway, you need to get in the car to do almost anything, except the beach and a few restaurants. It takes about 15 minutes by car (an hour if you take the bus) to get to the boardwalk. There are restaurants and attractions all over, however they are spread out. Overall though it was a great place to stay for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly Surprised”
Reviews.Author: artichoke72
Reviews.Content: I didn't know what to expect from the Sea Hawk Motel. For the price, I didn't have high expectations. I am happy to say I was pleasantly suprised. The lady working in the office was really nice and friendly. The motel property was very clean and well maintained. Our room was immaculate! Not even a grain of sand anywhere. Truly the cleanest hotel/motel room we have ever stayed in. The motel is located about 1 1/2 blocks from the beach and you don't have to cross a major street to get to it. The motel is located in the "uptown" section of Ocean City and not near the boardwalk. We didn't mind. We had a good time in Ocean City and would definitely stay at the Sea Hawk again.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place for a budget conscious family”
Reviews.Author: MeadowsValleyForge
Reviews.Content: We stayed at one of their 4th floor rooms with a very nice view of the main highway that dissects Ocean City. Room is quite decent, very clean and affordable for the price we paid ($150 for 3 adults & a 3 yr. old). Though this is the cheapest room available, it has all the amenities you need like a small refrigerator, AC that sends a of blast of arctic air, TV with ample cable channels, small desk, a table with two chairs, 2 queen beds and a sofa with pull out bed. Pool is clean and open until 8 PM. Place is very close to the beach through a small alley between condominiums. So close to the beach, you can walk back to your room many times for bathroom breaks. On our last day after handing back our keys, we used the outdoor shower to wash. There is also a small "changing room" which is actually a bathroom but without any hooks/holders for your dry/clean clothes. Just across the highway you can find numerous food joints like McDonald's, Wawa (gas, coffee, milk, hoagies, etc.), a pizza place, awesome crab cakes at the Crab Outlet (2nd traffic light towards downtown OC), Higgins (2-3 traffic lights on the opposite direction) with its phenomenal AYCE (all-you-can-eat) crabs. Overall, this is a phenomenal place to stay for budget conscious individuals. Location is family oriented and thus quiet during evening hours. I will definitely be coming back!

Reviews.Title: “Clean good value”
Reviews.Author: mg3542
Reviews.Content: Our first trip to Ocean City, MD. Once I got over the shock that there is an 8 lane highway that is unavoidable in Ocean City and got used to the hassle of dealing with it, I started to appreciate the little things. Like what a good value this motel was, and how incredibly clean it is. In a nutshell, it is an old motel that is very well maintained. Nothing fancy, but the property has made the most of itself. It is freshly painted, the outdoor walkways were scrubbed by housekeeping, and planters with flowers were placed where there was room. There was no beach grunge in the rooms, carpets were clean, and so were the bedspreads!!!! Housekeeping seemed to wash these frequently as we saw them piled up in laundry carts. Our room had comfy beds, a mini kitchen complete with stove, microwave, fridge, cutlery, dishes, pots, pans, flyswatter, 2 queens and a separate sofa area that had a folding door that could be pulled across for a separate "suite" like effect when the kids were asleep, we could stay up. All for around $157 is a night in peak season. It was a block to the beach and you don't have to cross the highway like so many other hotels (watching families with toddlers and infants cross an 8 lane highway to get to the beach was a frequent sight, so if you stay, stay beachside! ) There is a small but clean and refreshing pool. I liked this property. Just beware - Ocean Ctiy is very congested and overbuilt, with lots of high rises. Very different from LBI and Cape May in NJ, and Rehoboth in DE.

Reviews.Title: “Very Pleased !!”
Reviews.Author: Momofmany30
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a 5 night stay in Ocean City. It was our first visit there and we had no idea what to expect or where anything was located ect. After reading many excellent reviews on the Sea Hawk we decided to give it a try. We were very pleased! When we pulled in the parking lot at 10 PM , we noticed many people sitting out on their balconys and we were concerned it would be a noisy night. We slept like babies! We heard nothing.
